name: Glencairn Bed and Breakfast

reviews.title: Great B&B
reviews.text: After traveling around Scotland and staying in many B&B's we found this to be one of the best, My Mother had a single room and my Wife and I in a double room which were both very spacious and had all the little extras.

reviews.title: Possibly the best B&B in Scotland?
reviews.text: Parking out the front was good but also had the option of putting the car around the back, Breakfast was great!!

aka: Glencairn Bed And Breakfast Crieff, Scotland
